actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: A bill to amend chapter 61 of title 18, United States Code, relating to lotteries.

summary.text: Legalizes the advertisement, listing of prizes and other information concerning bingo games when such games are licensed by the laws of a State and the information is contained in a newspaper of general circulation published in that State. Exempts such actions from penalties imposed on the use of the postal service for gambling operations. (Adds 18 U.S.C. 1308; Amends 39 U.S.C. 3005(d)(1))

titles.title: A bill to amend chapter 61 of title 18, United States Code, relating to lotteries.
